titles.title: Recreational Marine Employment Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Longshore and Harbor Workers' Compensation Act to clarify the exemption for recreational vessel support employees, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 4/26/2005--Introduced. Recreational Marine Employment Act of 2005 - Amends the Longshore and Harbor Workers' Compensation Act to revise the exemption from coverage of the Act for recreational vessel support employees.
